name: Basketball Dream
description:
Ready to shoot some hoops? Dream of basketball is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics.

The quantity of the basketball is limited your goal is to shoot them for a better score.

Shoot the hoops, unlock new balls, become the next super star!

How to play
1. Touch the basketball
2. Slide it to the hoop
3. Shooting and get point

Come on now, join everybody on the playground of unlimited basketball action
